resources.string: Bluetooth Low Energy is not supported on this device. The application will not be able to automatcally determine your location.
Are you still in there? What the heck are you doing? Get out man, it is an emergency! I cannot hold it anymore.
Up for your daily dose of caffeine?
You are looking at it for more than 12 years of your life.. Are you brainstorming?
Holy Mary! I forgot my cigarettes in my coat pocket? Could you grab them for me please?
Yeah! Vacation at last, I am packing my stuff and I am out of this place! If only someone could take care of my plants..
